name: Hello Fractals
description:
I made a fractal toy! Since this is the first time I tried something like this, I call it "Hello Fractals".

This is not optimized and will run slow on older computers.

It works with random polynomials of second degree, with x and y coordinates and time as variables.

SPACE or mouse click: random pattern
CTRL: black&white on/off
ENTER: Fast-forward
Q, W, E, R, T: my patterns
